Home News & Gallery Articles News & Gallery Articles Videos DHA Health News Articles Search Articles by Keyword PHOTO INFORMATION Download Details Share 122nd Army Nurse Corps Birthday celebration 122nd Army Nurse Corps Birthday celebration News | Feb. 2, 2023 122nd Army Nurse Corps Birthday celebration at Tripler Army Medical Center By Hugh Fleming Tripler Army Medical Center - TAMC celebrated the 122nd Army Nurse Corps Birthday with guest speaker Col. (Ret) Patricia Nishimoto, followed by a cake cutting ceremony in the Chapel. Thank you to all nurses. IMAGE LINK SHARE PRINT Don't forget to keep your family's
